item.title: Uploading a standalone artifact to Nexus 3
item.description: This is one of those “I had to figure out how to do this today, so the next time I google this, I have a place to look” blog posts. Today, I had to upload a zip file as a build artifact to our Nexus 3 repository. The zip file had been generated by custom shell scripts that did not have a Maven, Ivy or Gradle projects to wrap them.
